name: Antiguo Citrus Mint Squeeze
garnish: 1 Grapefruit wedge, lime wedge and mint sprig
preparation:
In a shaker, muddle the grapefruit, lime and mint.
Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice.
Shake, and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge, lime wedge and mint sprig.
